name: DuyguTalk
_source: s;Duygu;Not much to be said, if you ask me.|Looks like we just got a new obstacle.
s;Simon;This isn't like our other foes.{w} He knows us well,|and will be prepared.
s;Duygu;Ah, cause the rest of 'em were pushovers?|Simon, Simon, Simon.|He's just another obstacle.|Don't let the betrayal get under your skin.
